title: How to Style an Undercut | AXE | Instagroom
description:
This is how Simone embraces his broken nose: with a piercing and a fierce undercut. 

THE TOOLS:
AXE Signature Clean Cut Look Classic Pomade 
Brush

THE STEPS:
1. Blow-dry hair 
2. Use brush for volume while blow-drying 
3. Mix pomade between fingers
4. Rake back

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: I like an undercut because it’s so easy. So to give my hair some volume, I follow the brush with the hair dryer. Take some pomade in my hand and then mix it. I put it on my hair, all the way back to give it a nicer look.
